alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 12 at 1:09PM PST until December 14 at 7:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From early Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds gusts are most likely near the foothills.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
